document_data.name: Khuur
document_data.mainbody:
{{otheruses4|the [[Merrow (ogre)|merrow]] kingdom|the instrument|Khuur (instrument)}}
'''Khuur''' was a [[Merrow (ogre)|merrow]] kingdom of [[Serôs]] under the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] in the 6th and 7th centuries [[DR]]. Alongside [[Nmalk]], it was one of the two [[Axe Kingdoms]] that represented the last of merrow civilization in Serôs.
document_data.History:
In the [[582 DR|Year of the Deep Wound, 582 DR]], [[Tarag]], a chieftain of the sea [[ogre]]s, used the powers of the sword [[Ilbratha|''Ilbratha'']] and his own battle strategies to conquer the western frontiers of the [[merfolk]] realm of [[Hmurrath]]. There, Tarag founded the two Axe Kingdoms of Khuur and Nmalk.

The Axe Kingdoms and Hmurrath fell to fighting in the [[653 DR|Year of the Killing Blow, 653 DR]], beginning the [[Ninth Serôs War]].

The merrow suffered a major defeat in the [[Battle of the Haunted Plains]] in the [[654 DR|Year of the Coveted Briars, 654 DR]]. Following their defeat, four-fifths of all merrow in Serôs were forced to flee south to the other side of the [[Sharksbane Wall]]. The rest survived on the [[Hmur Plateau]] or living amidst the ruins on the [[Haunted Plains]].

Three years of conflict culminated in the destruction of the Axe Kingdoms and the fall of the merrow to the merfolk of Hmurrath in the [[655 DR|Year of the Volanth, 655 DR]]. This saw the end of merrow "civilization" in Serôs.
document_data.Geography: The Axe Kingdoms lay along the [[Dragon Coast]] and along the coast of [[Sembia]], in the Sea of Fallen Stars.
